name: Phyno
description: '''Chibuzo Nelson Azubuike''' ({{Audio|Ig-Chibuzor_Nelson_Azubuike.ogg|listen|help=no}}; born 9 October 1986), known professionally as '''Phyno''', is a [[Nigerians|Nigerian]] rapper, singer, songwriter, and record producer. Despite being a native of [[Anambra State]], he was born and raised in [[Enugu State]]. Phyno started his music career as a producer in 2003 and primarily raps in [[Igbo language|Igbo]]. His debut studio album, ''[[No Guts No Glory (Phyno album)|No Guts No Glory]]'', was released in March 2014. It yielded the singles "Ghost Mode", "Man of the Year", "Parcel", and "O Set". Phyno's other albums include ''[[The Playmaker (album)|The Playmaker]]'' (2016), ''Deal With It'' (2019), ''[[Something to Live For (Phyno album)|Something to Live For]]'' (2021), and ''[[Full Time Job (album)|Full Time Job]]'' (2024).
